rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Narrow entry corridor to set the tone for a Brutalist design.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open plan living area combining dining space with high ceiling and exposed concrete surfaces.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the Living Room, open-concept design emphasizing brutalist aesthetics.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with industrial finishes and ample storage.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious room with high ceilings, private balcony, designed with a Brutalist aesthetic.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom featuring exposed concrete walls.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Smaller guest room in the Brutalist style.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Essential bathroom with minimalistic design and functional layout.

openings.description: Direct access from the ground floor to the swimming pool area.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Smaller bedroom for guests or family member.

rooms.name: Bedroom 6
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with natural light and exposed concrete elements.

rooms.name: Shared Bathroom
